alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Issaquena; Sharkey; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of East Carroll, Madison and southeastern West Carroll Parishes, Warren, southwestern Yazoo, western Hinds, Issaquena and southern Sharkey Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monticello, or 10 miles northeast of Delhi, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alsatia around 405 PM CDT. Omega, Sondheimer and Mansford around 410 PM CDT. Eagle Bend around 420 PM CDT. Redwood around 430 PM CDT. Bovina, Oak Ridge and Flowers around 440 PM CDT. Edwards and Youngton around 445 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Delta and Richmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and central, southwestern and west central Mississippi.
